name: TALKBOARD
description:
Grab your friends around the screen, 1st player enters a sentence without anyone else looking. Next player will see it for just a moment and enter the first thing that comes to mind. Continue until you are out of players and then see the madness of what your peers think. For 2 to 6 players.

Made in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2015.

Run on over to mulitplayer puzzle fun, Astral Breakers while you are here :)
